content: Investments Stocks Asked by Rasyad .Asked on 01 Aug 2019Does anyone know if singaporeans can use M1 finance?Heard about M1 finance but it's based in the US and I'm wondering if us Singaporeans can use this platform. Did anyone try before?1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 04 Aug 2019You need to be a US citizen or green card holder with a valid US mailing address to use their service. So nope we can't use it here unless you have the above
https://support.m1finance.com/hc/en-us/articles/221052687-Opening-an-M1-Account0 comments0
